attributes.action: ensure that police enforce the laws on arresting homosexuals who commit criminal sexual offences.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The deputy chief constable has stated that homosexuals who commit indecent criminal acts in a public place should not be arrested.

The law states that indecent acts in a public place are illegal and action should be taken,however under new guidelines,police have been told to walk on by and not to arrest offenders as doing so may offend the gay community.

The law is the law and should be applied to all criminals regardless of sexuality-if a person is committing an criminal offence,they should be arrested for it. 

We urge the Government to ensure that the law is applied evenly and that all offenders are prosecuted.
